headline.main: Rauschning Gets First Citizenship Papers; Sees Morale of German People Cracking

lead_paragraph: Dr. Herman Rauschning, once one of the leading citizens of Danzig, where he was President of the Senate, yesterday took out his first United States citizenship papers and declared that for him it was a "very decisive and favorable moment."
abstract: Applies for 1st U S citizenship papers; int
